item.title: CVE-2024-32084|2024-04-15T09:10:03.704Z -- Gold Plugins -- Before And After
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Gold Plugins Before And After.This issue affects Before And After: from n/a through 3.9.
